argument.description: The number to convert to an absolute value.

description: The PostgreSQL abs function returns the absolute value of a number.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT abs(-23);
 abs
-----
  23
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT abs(-23.6);
 abs
------
 23.6
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT abs(-23.65);
  abs
-------
 23.65
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT abs(23.65);
  abs
-------
 23.65
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT abs(30 * -1);
 abs
-----
  30
(1 row)
